You should use thesame parameters when encoding and decoding the same field. For more information,see base64 encoding options to decide which parameters to use.Performs Base64 decoding of the input string. The input is assumed to be a URL-safeBase64-encoded string.Your source data might contain Base64-encoded strings, such as blob metadata stringsor web URLs, that you want to make searchable as plain text. You can use thebase64Decode function to turn the encoded data back into regular strings whenpopulating your search index.
